meanings.definition: A pad of paper used for sketching or drawing.
meanings.sent1: I always carry my sketchpads to art class.
meanings.sent2: Artists often use sketchpads to capture their ideas.
meanings.sent3: The sketchpads were so full of drawings, they started to overflow!
meanings.sent4: Her mind was a collection of sketchpads filled with memories.
meanings.sent5: The colorful sketchpads on the table caught everyone's attention.

meanings.definition: A book of blank pages used for sketching or drawing.
meanings.sent1: She bought a new set of sketchpads for her art project.
meanings.sent2: The store sells various sizes of sketchpads for artists.
meanings.sent3: The sketchpads on the shelf whispered to each other, 'Pick me! Pick me!'
meanings.sent4: His imagination was a vast library of sketchpads waiting to be filled.
meanings.sent5: The blank sketchpads held endless possibilities for creativity.
